info.name: Cafeh
info.description: This look has been reformatted for those who don't like Japanese comic book culture. In this way, the style became more adult and moreover simplified.
info.additionalInfo: In the last update, there have been changes to button formats, link shading effects, and fonts. The background got a more elegant shape that now blend well the texture of the buttons in their shades of brown.

author.name: C h a c o n A l e x
